definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)

sentences.english: This created an interesting back-and-forth on the comments section of the article. For instance,  Mike Amundsen states
sentences.chinese: 這篇博文引起了一組有趣的來來回回的評論。

sentences.english: Yeah, over the past 2 years I've been back and forth in Brazil.
sentences.chinese: 是，過去兩年我來來回回去了巴西好多次。

sentences.english: All day they swung up and down the main street in long teams.
sentences.chinese: 從早到晚他們都排着長隊在大街上來來回回轉着。

sentences.english: You can move side to side, back and forth, or in circles with your middle finger.
sentences.chinese: 你可以兩邊着力，來來回回，或者用中指畫圈。

sentences.english: But really, the wind is really too much to go back and forth all the difficulties.
sentences.chinese: 不過說真的，風也真是太大了，來來回回走得都困難。

sentences.english: They batted the shuttlecock back and forth across the net a few time.
sentences.chinese: 他們幾次來來回回打羽毛球。

sentences.english: The Tungans were stricter than the Turkish Muslims in their religious worship.
sentences.chinese: 回回在他們的宗教信仰上比突厥穆斯林更嚴格。

sentences.english: Deep more midnight, come to return to return you tired not tired?
sentences.chinese: 深更半夜，來來回回你累不累啊？

sentences.english: Logistic regression analysis was implemented to find an association of such variables with the presence of SSI.
sentences.chinese: 邏輯式回回歸分析SSI和這些風險因素的關係。

sentences.english: To and fro on fallen petals, how can I bear treading?
sentences.chinese: 來來回回的踏着落花，我於心何忍？

sentences.english: Mother carried the wicker basket and searched those rice panicles under the sky up and down.
sentences.chinese: 母親就提着柳籃，來來回回地在天空下搜尋。

sentences.english: It is obvious that direct contact is much better than correspondence to and for.
sentences.chinese: 很明顯，直接接觸比來來回回地通信要好得多。

sentences.english: All day long he flies back and forth from his branch to the feeder.
sentences.chinese: 這一整天，他在喂料器和枝椏之間來來回回。

sentences.english: Back and forth I went with the slides.
sentences.chinese: 於是，我就來來回回地放着幻燈片。

sentences.english: She noticed the other bird moving back and forth on the edge of the cage .
sentences.chinese: 女孩注意到另一隻鳥兒在籠邊來來回回走個不停。

sentences.english: She moves back and forth between writing longhand and on the computer.
sentences.chinese: 接着，她會在手寫和電腦寫作之間來來回回。

definition: Inner Mongolia (lit. south of the Gobi Desert)
Jurchen, a Tungus ethnic group, predecessor of the Manchu ethnic group who founded the Later Jin Dynasty 後金|后金[Hou4 Jin1] and Qing Dynasty
Hui Islamic ethnic group living across China
Huihu, Tang dynasty name of ethnic group corresponding to modern Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]
Tartar (various northern tribes in ancient China)/Tatar (Turkic ethnic group in central Asia)
ethnic groups in the north and west of China in ancient times/foreigner/barbarian
Outer Mongolia (lit. north of the Gobi Desert)
Qidan or Khitan, ethnic group in ancient China, a branch of the Eastern Hu people inhabiting the valley of the Xar Murun River in the upper reaches of the Liao River 遼河|辽河[Liao2 He2]
